{{repo.unit}} {{repo.name}} {{repo.currencyName}} {{repo.forexBuying}} {{repo.forexSelling}} {{repo.banknoteBuying}} {{repo.banknoteSelling}} {{repo.crossRateUSD}} {{repo.crossRateOther}}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { PostService } from './post.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent implements OnInit { gets:any; userInput ?: string; constructor(private service:PostService) {} ngOnInit() { this.service.getPosts(this.userInput) .subscribe(response => { this.gets = response; }); } public getPosts(){ this.service.getPosts(this.userInput) .subscribe(response => { this.gets = response; }); } }
